name: Chup de Salaryman
description:
A salaryman wakes up in the middle of an stampede! Help him avoid the wild bulls, many desert obstacles and the mythical Chuppercabrer, and don't forget to take a coffee break once in a while! Such a dumb concept for a game couldn't take more than 5 minutes to play, and certainly less than 24 hours to make! :P

Default Controls:

[W] [S] – Move
[Space] – Menu Select
[F4] - Scale Window
[F5] - Change Volume
[F9] - Change Aspect Ratio
